#id=1
#text=I like to go grocery shopping and went yesterday .
#id=2
#text=The first thing I did when I arrived was park closest the exit I knew I 'd be using after I 'm finished .
#id=3
#text=Then I went inside and chose a shopping cart .
#id=4
#text=Next , I used the wipes the store provides at the entrance and wipe off the handle of the shopping cart , and my hands , so I know my hands will stay clean while I choose my food .
#id=5
#text=Then I took out the shopping list I wrote at home and I started .
#id=6
#text=I always start with heavy things like cans and boxes so I can put them in the bottom of my cart .
#id=7
#text=Then I went to the cold and frozen foods and put them into my cart next .
#id=8
#text=After that , I chose meat and fresh produce as well as things like bread , eggs and chips which need to stay on top of the other food so they wo n't get crushed .
#id=9
#text=When I had everything I needed , I went to the check out line that seemed the fastest and shortest .
#text=Then I unloaded my groceries onto the counter so the check out clerk could add the costs .
#text=I was sure to keep my cold foods together so the clerk would pack them together in bags and keep them cold .
#text=I gave her my own cloth bags because it helps the environment by not using paper or plastic .
#text=Once my groceries were all packed neatly into my cart , I took them to my car , loaded them into my trunk and then put the empty cart into the cart area .
